ygData.subject: Re: Brass Animation and thanks to Harmonic
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, I noticed this yesterday. I just made 18 and tried out DDD for the first time. I actually blew into the correct end (small end). Now I m finally ready to
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, I noticed this yesterday. I just made 18 and tried out DDD for the
first time. I actually blew into the correct end (small end). Now I'm
finally ready to perfect the DDD/CoD/Hymn combo.

Also, using a tip from the experts here, I trained my brass skill to max in
the Shady Swashbuckler cave in the tunnel from E Commons to N Ro. Woke up
this morning, scrolled up the messages and saw I was maxed at 95! I think
this is almost as safe as the Arena for uninterrupted instrument training.

Finally, a huge THANK YOU to Harmonic Distortion for letting me tag along
yesterday. I've got a ton of screenshots of him killing Froon and Choon with
Charm (I added my _hefty_ melee skills to help finish off the winner <g>).
He also saved my bardic butt with chain/fear when I got Froon on me before
we were ready. I now have the two Runes from these beasties in the bank
waiting for the day when I'm ready to pursue the rest of the lambent quest
items. Thanks also for the equipment, Harmonic!

Operaman
Meandering Maestro of the 18th Song
Innoruuk


> From: Jada <jadakost@...>
>
> I haven't seen anyone say anything about this, but the
> brass horn animation is now fixed. I was happily
> surprised when I went into "3D" view and noticed it =)
>
> Jada MacAldred
> Povar bard of the 44th Chorus
